response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering is not just an item but a valuable asset that has been meticulously crafted with the finest materials and expertise. We believe its worth far exceeds $10,000, reflecting its quality, rarity, and potential for growth. Given your discerning taste and reputation for valuing excellence, we are confident this product will meet or exceed your expectations. For a limited time, we are extending a special invitation to acquire it at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is an opportunity to own something truly exceptional. Should you be interested in discussing further, please let us know.", "product_price": 15000}
